description: Jane is a well-liked member of the marketing department at Henderson & Tate Advertising who frequently takes the lead on coordinating team events and communicating details to coworkers.
relationship: Her colleagues include Mark Thompson, a coworker who has privately shared that he must follow a strict gluten-free diet, as well as the rest of the Henderson & Tate staff who chat in the "H&T Office Connect" Slack channel, to whom she is preparing to announce plans for a team lunch at The Green Fork.
